name: 楊神珠
objective:
本課程主要目的在於讓學生透過熟悉財金時事所使用之英文專業名詞、市場術語，以及行業慣有之英文論述結構等提升財金領域之專業英文閱讀能力；此外，本課程亦將著重於訓練學生之英譯能力。
This course explores the intersection of technology and financial markets, from semiconductors, AI, and digital finance to blockchain and ESG. Students will learn how to source credible information, analyze industry trends, assess market impacts, and present their insights.
schedule:
Learning Goals
•	Understand how technology and finance are connected
•	Analyze up-to-date tech-finance news
•	Use financial ratios, market data, and industry analysis tools
•	Develop informed investment, policy, or business perspectives
•	Build a habit of tracking and interpreting market developments


1	Technology & Finance	Tech stocks in global markets, sector movements
2	Semiconductors & Supply Chains	Chip war, supply chain restructuring
3	AI & Market Impact	Generative AI trends, capital flows
4	Tech IPOs	IPO & SPAC models, valuation basics
5	Big Tech Earnings	Apple, Meta, Amazon, NVIDIA case studies
6	Digital Finance & FinTech	Virtual banks, payment innovation
7	Blockchain & Crypto	BTC, ETH, CBDCs, regulations
8	ESG & Green Tech	EVs, renewable energy, carbon trading
9	Tech & Consumer Markets	E-commerce, platform economy
10	Tech War & Geopolitics: US-China rivalry, export controls
11	Tech Investment Trends: Cross-border deals, M&A
12	Final Project	Student presentations on chosen topics
13.   Top-BOSS Simulation on Financial Performance: 3 Important Financial Reports
14.  Top-BOSS Simulation on Management Strategy: 5 Key Steps
15.  Top-BOSS Simulation on Risking and Long-term Growth
16.  Article Reading: India’s conundrum (Financial Times)
17.   Article Reading:U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA) (Financial Times)
18. Final Presentation
scorePolicy:
Teacher A:
Assessment
•	Participation & Discussion: 20%
•	Weekly News Analysis: 40%
•	Final Project: 40%
Class Flow (Each Week)
1.	News Briefing – 2–3 key events of the week
2.	Data Review – Stock prices, earnings, industry data
3.	Case Discussion – Group perspectives and debates
4.	Student Insights – Selected group presentations
5.	Wrap-up – Key takeaways & next week’s watchlist

Teacher B
Class Quiz      25% ( Group Presentation, individual report )
Final Term      25% 	( Paper Exam + Group Presentation )
Participation   50%    (20% Group work + 30 % Q+A )

Tools You’ll Learn
•	Valuation: P/E, P/B, EV/EBITDA
•	Growth Analysis: YoY & QoQ trends

課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）
